widget.label: Short URL Settings
widget.tooltip: Whenever you want to share a URL, having a short one usually makes it a lot simpler!
widget.help: The registration form let you enter the necessary information to create an account on the Snap! System. Note that you will then be able to use your website on all Snap! websites running at Made to Order Software Corporation.

widget.label: Email
widget.tooltip: Enter your email address to register for a Snap! Website account. It must be a currently valid email address.
widget.help: Enter your email address to register for a Snap! Website account. It must be a currently valid email address. You may change your email address later while editing your account.

widget.label: Password
widget.tooltip: Enter your Snap! password. Do not forget that you are expected to use a different password on each website where you create an account.
widget.help: Enter a password that you will use with your Snap! website activities. Note that it is suggested that you never use the same password on more than one website so this password should be unique. Any character can be used in your password and it can be as long as 256 characters.

widget.label: Confirm Password
widget.tooltip: Enter your Snap! password again to make sure you did not mistype it.
widget.help: This box requires you to re-enter your Snap! password in order to make sure you typed it properly.

widget.label: Save
widget.help: You already have an account? Click this link to go to the log in page instead.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the home page
widget.help: Changed your mind? Click on this Cancel link to return to the home page.
